verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: North Korea] [V: threatened] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: to cancel the forthcoming summit between leader Kim Jong Un and US President Donald Trump if Washington presses ahead with its key demand for Pyongyang to unilaterally give up its nuclear arsenal.</p] >

< p > [ARG0: North Korea] threatened Wednesday to [V: cancel] [ARG1: the forthcoming summit between leader Kim Jong Un and US President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: if Washington presses ahead with its key demand for Pyongyang to unilaterally give up its nuclear] arsenal.</p >

< p > North Korea threatened Wednesday to cancel the forthcoming summit between leader Kim Jong Un and US President Donald Trump if [ARG0: Washington] [V: presses] [ARG2: ahead] [ARG1: with its key demand for Pyongyang to unilaterally give up its nuclear] arsenal.</p >

< p > North Korea threatened Wednesday to cancel the forthcoming summit between leader Kim Jong Un and US President Donald Trump if Washington presses ahead with its key demand for [ARG0: Pyongyang] to [ARGM-MNR: unilaterally] [V: give] up [ARG1: its nuclear] arsenal.</p >
